page.title: 10THE STANDARD OF LIVING
page.content:
I am fifteen years old. I have to go to school by law and my parents are totally in charge of me. At this point in time 3 million people are on the dole and 4 million are unemployed. And so most people of my age are facing unemployment unless something drastic is done. These days the latest craze is drugs and although it is illegal it is very easy to get hold of them and at this time it seems to me that the police aren't doing much. The standard of living in the Western world is improving all the time, with advances in medical fronts all the time. However in the eastern world the living standard is bad.
JON GITTOES 5O
